prompt_templates.template_string: Consider the observer, [AGENT_ID], who is at grid position ([AGENT_X],[AGENT_Y]) and is facing [AGENT_ORIENTATION]. [TARGET_OBJECT_ID], which is located at ([TARGET_OBJECT_X],[TARGET_OBJECT_Y]) and is facing [TARGET_OBJECT_ORIENTATION]. Based on [AGENT_ID]'s current perspective, in which primary direction is [TARGET_OBJECT_ID] located?

Consider the observer, [AGENT_ID], who is at grid position ([AGENT_X],[AGENT_Y]) and is facing [AGENT_ORIENTATION]. [TARGET_OBJECT_ID], which is located at ([TARGET_OBJECT_X],[TARGET_OBJECT_Y]) and is facing [TARGET_OBJECT_ORIENTATION]. Based on [TARGET_OBJECT_ID]'s current perspective, in which primary direction is [AGENT_ID] located?
